pr_title: Update ArithmeticException to IllegalArgumentException in StickyPartitionAssignmentStrategy.

timeline.message:
Merge pull request #1 from linkedin/master

Pull latest
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:linkedin/brooklin into HEAD

timeline.bodyText: just curious, do we know why currentAssignment size was 0? I know saw this happen once on ZK session expiry and looked like the ZKClient was null (had the fix Justin made)
timeline.author: somandal

replies.bodyText: Also the log message, can we change it to: "Retry leader partition assignment"?
replies.author: somandal

replies.bodyText: Unfortunately, I don't have the logs to confirm why. I thought it is still a good fix irrespective of the cause.
replies.author: vmaheshw

timeline.bodyText: Isn't this going to raise IllegalArgumentException since for whatever reason we are seeing it be 0? Not sure I understand what the change set out to achieve. Throw a more appropriate exception?
timeline.author: DEEPTHIKORAT

replies.bodyText: I feel IllegalArgumentException is appropriate for this api. This change is to not do the assignment if total assignments are zero and redo leader assignment.
replies.author: vmaheshw

replies.bodyText: Just to clarify, the behavior of this this won't change right, just the type of exception thrown? Even before this change, an exception would be thrown and the assignment retried?
replies.author: somandal

replies.bodyText: Yes, Just Arithmetic Exception is something we want to avoid.
replies.author: vmaheshw
